section.para: To update List Prices by Product Category, select the "Update List Prices by Product Category" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Update List Prices by Product Category

section.para: When updating List Prices by Product Category, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to update List Prices for all Product Categories.
Specify Product Category whose List Prices you want to update.
Enter a Product Category pattern to select a range of Product Categories. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Enter a positive or negative value to indicate how much you want to update your List Prices by. The value represents either a percentage or fixed amount update, based on the following selection:
Select to update List Prices by a percentage amount.
Select to update List Prices by a fixed amount.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without updating List Prices by Product Category, returning you to the application desktop.
Updates List Prices by Product Category, using the specified parameters.
